user_instruction: 'Send an email to Vitality Partners to update them on our HealthHub requirements. You can check out my Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Latest HealthHub Requirements for Upcoming Email to Vitality Partners

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. I’m preparing an update email for Vitality Partners and want to be sure it accurately reflects our most current HealthHub requirements. Could you please share the latest details—especially any changes or additions that have been logged recently?

If it’s easiest, feel free to:
• Point me to (or grant me access to) the relevant Notion pages  
• Forward any recent Gmail threads that outline new requirements  
• Flag any key dates or milestones on the calendar that I should highlight

Having this information by [insert preferred date/time] would be greatly appreciated so I can finalize the correspondence without delay.

Thanks in advance for your help!

Best regards,  
[Your Name]

final_output:
